data.actual_result: The Games tab has no content in it.
data.expected_result: You are able to see content in the Games tab
data.short_description: [Firefox only] Visiting the Games tab URL (discordapp.com/activity) doesn't load on Firefox.
data.steps_to_repro: - Load Firefox - Visit discordapp . com / activity (or canary . discordapp . com / activity)- Note: Must be loaded directly from Firefox (type in the URL). If you press "Friends" and reload, games tab works fine.
